actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on N- (2,3-Dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl) -5- methyl-4-[(meth ylamino) sulphonyl] phenyl] azo] naphthalene-2-carboxaminde.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on N-(2,3,-dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol- 5-yl)-5-methyl-4- ((methyl amino) sulphonyl) phenyl) azo) naphthalene-2-carboxaminde.

titles.title: To suspend until December 31, 2002, the duty on N- (2,3-Dihydro-2-oxo-1H-benzimidazol-5-yl) -5- methyl-4-[(meth ylamino) sulphonyl] phenyl] azo] naphthalene-2-carboxaminde.
